values.text: You can rest assured this conversation is secured.
This chat is secure. Don't worry.
All our data is stored securely over the cloud.
It's completely secure.
We ensure that data you provided us is secured.
Rest assured. We have kept the information securely.
May I know your Name and Email ID or Telephone number?

We are open Monday-Friday from 9 am - 10 pm. On Saturdays, we run from 10 am - 5 pm. We are closed on Sundays.  Our hours vary on Public Holidays. Please check our website for any changes in our working hours. You can also order online.

You can reach out to us over the phone at (111)111-1111 and (999)999-9999. 
We are located at 100 North Atherton Street, New York. 
Our customer care representative would be happy to meet you in person if you have any concerns which couldn't be resolved over the phone.
You can also refer to our webpage for more information.

You can reach out to us over the phone at (111)111-1111 and (999)999-9999. 
We are located at 100 North Atherton Street, New York.
You can also refer to our webpage for more information.

I am sorry to hear that. Please go to the login tab, under the Sign In button, there is a Blue colored link saying "Forgot your Password", click on that link. It will ask for your registered email id. Once you enter your email it will send a link to your email. You can click on the link and it will prompt you to enter and save the new Password.

I can help you with the account (Open, Close, Notification), provide information regarding the products and services offered, and other things under my scope. I can also connect you to a Human-agent if required.

Thank you so much for being interested in working with us. We have a wide range of opportunities in the fields like Design, Legal, R&D, Operations, Marketing,  Engineering, Finance, Product Management, Program Management, Sales, Security and many more. 
Please refer to our careers page for more information.

Glad to know you are interested in working with us. We have a wide range of opportunities in the fields like Design, Legal, R&D, Operations, Marketing,  Engineering, Finance, Product Management, Program Management, Sales, Security and many more. 
Please refer to our careers page for more information.

Thank you so much for being interested in working with us. We have a wide range of opportunities in various fields. 
Please refer to our careers page for more information.

I hope you are satisfied with my service. Bye Bye. See you again soon.
If there is nothing else I could help with, please press the close button to end the chat.

I am sorry if I could not serve you with anything. I am constantly trying to be better.
If there is nothing else I could help with, please press the close button to end the chat.

See you next time. Bye. 
If there is nothing else I could help with, please press the close button to end the chat.
I am a Bot. I'll try my best to serve you like a Human-agent.
I am a bot built by Human.
I am a bot. I'll try to resolve your concerns as much as I can.
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
I am sorry. I didn't get you.

You can change the order by going to My Orders tab and selecting the items which need to be changed. After selecting the items you can click on replace and the webpage will prompt you to browse and select new items. 
Please remember that order could be changed only within 24 hours after placing the order.
I am sorry. I was not helpful. I'll inform the human agent and the agent will contact you shortly.

generic.message_to_human_agent: Hi! A user wants to connect to you.

values.text:
Human agents are busy at the current moment. Please leave your contact number or email along with the message in the inquiries section of the webpage, the agent will contact you shortly. 
I am sorry for the inconvenience. I would be glad if there is anything else I could help you with.
Please go to the My orders tab and on the right-hand side, you can find cancel order link.  Please note that you can only cancel if the order placed within 48 hours.

It's great to know that you want to join us. 
Please go to the Login/Sign up section on our webpage. Provide your details like Name, Email, Phone number,  Address, Preferences, and a strong password.  Once you are done click on the Create Account button.  
You may receive a link on your email to verify the account. You are all set and good to go, once you click on the link and verify your account.

Glad to know you like our stuff. You can create an account with us and add items to the cart, add your Payment details and Delivery address and further proceed to checkout. More information regarding this can be found in our FAQs.

We are very sorry to know that you would be leaving us. 
Please let us know if we can do anything to make your experience better.
To cancel the account with us, please log in to your account and go to user settings. Find the Deactivate account button at the bottom of the page. Once you click the Deactivate account button, your account would be deactivated.
You will be missed.

We are delighted to know that you are interested in our Products. We offer a wide range of products like Food, Clothes, Accessories, Electronics, Home and Kitchen, Beauty and Health products, Sports, Toys and Baby products.
You can visit our webpage to look over various categories and sub-categories we offer and browse your favorite products. 
We are always happy to serve you. Happy Shopping!!!!!
Glad to hear that. Thanks for appreciating me.
Thanks for the compliment. I'll try my best to serve you.
I am sorry I was not helpful.
I am trying my best to improve.
I am sorry to disappoint you.
Please log in to your account and go to the Preferences tab. You can modify the notification settings and set your preferences according to your requirements.
Please login to your account and go to User Settings. You can make desirable changes like updating contact details, changing password, adding new email or phone.
Glad to know I was helpful.
I'll try my best to serve you.
Thanks for the information.
Thanks for taking my services.
Your appreciation motivates me to perform even better.
Hello. How can I help you?
Hi! How are you doing today?
